attributes.action: examine the fatality rate from stabbings and street violence - look to manage the situation by adopting an emergency services policy to reassure the public and improve the outcomes of victims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the closure of A  & E departments,
and problems training, recruiting and retaining public sector staff, the petitioner is calling on the British govt. to launch an initiative to co - ordinate emergency services so being stabbed doesn't necessarily mean death.

A 7 minute - ambulance : casualty ETA target is set, but this goal omits to highlight the time from crime scene to hospital. Please address this. 

Policing a nation of open spaces, parks and streets is infinitely difficult. Of course, peaceful, law - abiding people have nothing to fear, other than miscarriages of justice, criminals and the crime itself, but we the undersigned are calling for investment into continguency management - Be prepared !
